snippet: LARMETT--Linda, nee Magnani, July 12, 1946 - April 25, 2016. Survived by her husband of 23 years, James C. Larmett, her sister-in-law Nora Doyle Magnani and nephews Brian and Marc Magnani. Services were private. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LARMETT--Linda, nee Magnani, July 12, 1946 - April 25, 2016. Survived by her husband of 23 years, James C. Larmett, her sister-in-law Nora Doyle Magnani and nephews Brian and Marc Magnani. Services were private. 1/3
